title: RIOT PLZ HELP ME I CANT PLAY ITS BEEN 3 DAYS
body: This keeps happening since i got off the legacy client what do i do click the link to see the picture plz

replies.body:
That's a mighty fine champion pool you got there. Must make things a little difficult eh xD?

Jokes aside, let's see if we can get that fixed up so you can get back in the game. This may be something as simple as a weird type of connection problem. Sometimes your own internet is in tip top shape, but for some reason that signal gets all funky along the way to our servers. Hit up our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to see if we can get this straightened out, but we should at the least be able to narrow down the main issue!
